name: Space Chiptune
description:
Description:

Space Chiptune is a 4 player local versus game where the chaos theory is displayed in a simulated universe. Throw in to a simulation a custom made planet and try to be the last planet standing. Be carefull! Each modification your contenders make might change the result of the game.

Controls (ironically):

  • Player 1: 
    • W and S -> Modify launch strength 
    • A and D ->  Modify launch angle
  • Player 2:
    • G and B -> Modify launch strength 
    • V and N -> Modify launch angle
  • Player 3:
    • I and K -> Modify launch strength 
    • J and L -> Modify launch angle
  • Player 4:
    • Arrow Up and Down -> Modify launch strength 
    • Arrow Left and Right -> Modify launch angle

(Sorry about the slow change of the angles,  we will make an update as soon as we can)

Credits:

  • Game Design: Everyone
  • Production: FellowGuy
  • Programming: GodlyPie
  • Art: Nodochi
  • Music: Buqueleman
